snippet.title: Tiny Echo Announce Trailer
snippet.description: Tiny Echo is a quintessential Might and Delight title with the perfect blend of aesthetic elegance coupled with a soothing soundtrack composed by Mount West. Follow us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/developer/mightanddelight
